means.word_mean: 1. subject to breaking into sharp slender pieces
2. resembling or consisting of or embedded with long slender fragments of (especially) wood having sharp points;

sentences.sentence: "a rough splintery floor of old pine boards"

auth_sentence.content: I was aware of the wooden steps, the wooden porch, the wooden door as the splintery portal to the Day of Judgment.
